title: eNNuvadellAm
sahitya:
eNNuvadellAm eidiDalAgum uNmaiyum Arvamum uLam tanilirundAl


anupallavi

  maNNinil ariyadAm mAperum sheyalgaLum viNNavar nATTinilE mEviDum inbamum


caraNam    urudiyum Ukkamum OivilA uzhaippum uNDenil AgAda oru sheyal uNDA 
karudiyadanaittum nAm kaivarap-peruvOm aridenum vAcakam aghanriDak-kANbOm
